metadata.synopsis: Astarion and Minthara explore Cazador's palace

2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
2.text: Ominous, yet austere. This place has its charms.
2.context: NodeContext: admiring the decor in a vampire's home

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: We're both learning a lot. Cazador kept this place all to himself.
1.context: NodeContext: responding to Astaroin who is sulking he never saw this part of the house - Minthara mocks him

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: I do not blame him. It is not the sort of place servants or spawn should sully with their presence.
0.context: NodeContext: responding to Astaroin who is sulking he never saw this part of the house - Minthara mocks him
